'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire world map|location]] in {{poe2}}.

==Background==
This large estate is the property of [[Takano]], renowned for his hospitality.

==Characters==
* [[Takano]]: The owner

==Loot==
* [[Cornett of Waves]]: In the locked trunk in the back.
